description.value:
At 2nd level and every 2 levels thereafter, the warden gains new ways of defending or otherwise aiding his allies, and may select a reinforcement from the universal reinforcements list or the appropriate list of vigil-specific reinforcements. The DC of any saving throw called for by a reinforcement is equal to 10 + 1/2 the warden’s level + the warden’s casting ability modifier. Each reinforcement may only be selected once unless otherwise noted.

Universal Reinforcements
